title: A brief description of the excellent vertues of that sober and wholesome drink, called coffee, And its incomparable effects in preventing or curing most diseases incident to humane bodies.
publisher: Printed for Paul Greenwood, and are to be sold at the sign of the Coffee-Mill and Tobacco Roll in Cloath-fair West-Smithfield who selleth the best arabian coffee-powder and chocolate, made in cake or in roll, after the Spanish fashion, &c,
